languages.text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}! Прошу, помогите мне!" {n}Кассия протягивает руки, моля о помощи, но все ее тело сотрясается от переполняющей силы — и она вот-вот вырвется вновь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}! Прошу, помогите мне!" {n}Кассия протягивает руки, моля о помощи, но все ее тело сотрясается от переполняющей силы — и она вот-вот вырвется вновь.{/n}

languages.text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}! Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}! Прошу, помогите мне!" {n}Кассия протягивает руки, моля о помощи, но все ее тело сотрясается от переполняющей силы — и она вот-вот вырвется вновь.{/n}

Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}

languages.text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…気がおかしくなってしまいそうです、{name}！助けてください！」{n}カシアは懇願するような仕草で両手をあなたに差し伸べるが、彼女の全身は溢れんばかりのパワーに震えており、今にも爆発しそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}! Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…気がおかしくなってしまいそうです、{name}！助けてください！」{n}カシアは懇願するような仕草で両手をあなたに差し伸べるが、彼女の全身は溢れんばかりのパワーに震えており、今にも爆発しそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，我……我要发疯了，{name}！求求你，救救我吧！”{n}卡西娅恳求地向你伸出了双手，但她的力量却在不断溢出，整个身体都在颤抖。你看得出来，她的力量很快就要再次爆发了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}! Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，我……我要发疯了，{name}！求求你，救救我吧！”{n}卡西娅恳求地向你伸出了双手，但她的力量却在不断溢出，整个身体都在颤抖。你看得出来，她的力量很快就要再次爆发了。{/n}

languages.text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... Y me estoy volviendo loca, {name}. ¡Ayúdeme, por favor!». {n}Cassia extiende las manos hacia ti en un gesto suplicante, pero todo su cuerpo tiembla con la fuerza de su poder desbocado, a punto de estallar de nuevo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}! Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... Y me estoy volviendo loca, {name}. ¡Ayúdeme, por favor!». {n}Cassia extiende las manos hacia ti en un gesto suplicante, pero todo su cuerpo tiembla con la fuerza de su poder desbocado, a punto de estallar de nuevo.{/n}

languages.text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und ich werde verrückt, {name}! Bitte helft mir!" {n}Cassia streckt flehentlich die Hände nach dir aus, doch ihr gesamter Körper bebt von ihrer überbordenden Kraft, und du merkst, dass sie gleich wieder hervorschießen wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}! Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und ich werde bekloppt, {name}! Bitte helft mir!" {n}Cassia streckt flehentlich die Hände nach dir aus, doch ihr gesamter Körper bebt von ihrer überbordenden Kraft, und du merkst, dass sie gleich wieder hervorschießen wird.{/n}

languages.text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... je perds la tête, {name} ! Je vous en prie, aidez-moi ! » {n}Cassia tend la main dans un geste implorant, le corps toujours secoué par la puissance du pouvoir qui la submerge. Vous sentez qu'il est de nouveau sur le point d'exploser.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}! Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... Je perds la tête, {name}. Je vous en prie, aidez-moi ! » {n}Cassia tend la main dans un geste implorant, le corps toujours secoué par la puissance du pouvoir qui la submerge. Vous sentez qu'il est de nouveau sur le point d'exploser.{/n}

languages.text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Gerçekten delirmek üzereyim {name}! Lütfen bana yardım et!" {n}Cassia, yalvarırcasına ellerini sana uzatıyor. Tüm vücudu, taşmak üzere olan gücü yüzünden titriyor. Yine zincirlerinden kurtulmak üzere olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}! Please, help me!" {n}Cassia reaches out her hands to you in a pleading gesture but her entire body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Gerçekten delirmek üzereyim {name}! Lütfen bana yardım et!" {n}Cassia yalvarırcasına ellerini sana uzatıyor ancak tüm vücudu, taşmak üzere olan gücü yüzünden titriyor. Bir kez daha zincirlerinden kurtulmak üzere olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n}
